title: West Bengal: Three injured in blast while making bomb in TMC leader’s house | kolkata | Hindustan Times
text:
West Bengal: Three injured in blast while making bomb in TMC leader’s house kolkata Updated: Feb 22, 2017 22:55 IST PTI, Burdwan (WB) Representational photo. 
Three persons were seriously injured in an explosion that occurred when they were making bombs in an under-construction house of a local Trinamool Congress leader in Burdwan district on Wednesday, the police said. 
The incident occurred at Hariharpara village under Krishnadebpur panchayat in Kalna I block in the afternoon. 
Locals arrived at the spot after hearing a loud explosion and found three wounded men in the under- construction house of Babu Mondal, a Trinamool Congress’ trade union wing leader. 
The three - identified as Tanmay Malik, Uday Barik and Nabakumar Bag - were taken to Kalna Sub-divisional Hospital where their condition was stated to be serious. 
Police said the house has been sealed while Babu Mondal was absconding after the incident. tags
